name: Motorbike Time Trial
description:
Summary and Controls

I created this mini game for fun, during two days spent using Unity 3D and FMOD. I wanted to learn how to use Wheel Colliders with motorbikes!

You can drive the motorbike using W, A, S, D. The objective is trying to reach the end of the track, improving your last high score.

Will you reach the Finish Line without crashing?

Acknowledgments

All props and 3D models/textures are from the Unity Asset Store, except for the speedometer, that I made with Photopea.

Music and sound effects come from Freesound and YouTube. They are all royalty free / CC0, except the motorbike brake sound that has been recorded by fractanimal (here: https://freesound.org/people/fractanimal/sounds/614627/ ).

Troubleshooting

Sometimes WebGL has some issues loading FMOD sounds. If you cannot hear the background music, for example, please try reloading the page and running the game again.
